biotools.summary: ftmsRanalysis is an R package for exploratory data analysis and interactive visualization of FT-MS data. This R package provides functionality for data formatting, preprocessing, filtering, exploratory data analysis and visualization of fourier transform (FT) mass spectrometry (MS) data.
